# Test beads blocked command
beads init --prefix test

# Create first issue
beads create 'First issue'
cp stdout first.txt
exec sh -c 'grep -oE "test-[a-f0-9]+" first.txt > first_id.txt'

# Create second issue that depends on first
exec sh -c 'beads create "Second issue" --deps $(cat first_id.txt)'
cp stdout second.txt

# Check for blocked issues
beads blocked
stdout 'test-'
